sections.heading: in ownership and control, defined
sections.text: Change in ownership and control has the same meaning as described in 34 C.F.R. 600.31, which shall mean the regulation as amended on November 1, 2019, and which took effect on July 1, 2020.SourceLaws 2020, LB1107, ยง 50.

77-6507.Change in ownership and control, defined.

Change in ownership and control has the same meaning as described in 34 C.F.R. 600.31, which shall mean the regulation as amended on November 1, 2019, and which took effect on July 1, 2020.

SourceLaws 2020, LB1107, ยง 50.
